definitions.definition: A fruit of plants of the gourd family Cucurbitaceae , possessing a hard rind and producing many seeds in a single, central , pulpy chamber.
A plant producing such a fruit.

main_definition: A fruit of plants of the gourd family Cucurbitaceae , possessing a hard rind and producing many seeds in a single, central , pulpy chamber.
secondary_definitions: A plant producing such a fruit.
